nonCompete.message: Non-competes ENFORCEABLE under specific statutory requirements
nonCompete.detailedExplanation: Louisiana statute provides specific requirements for enforceable non-competes: employee must have access to confidential information or trade secrets, geographic limitation to parishes where employee worked, time limit of 2 years from termination.
nonCompete.suggestion: Follow statutory requirements strictly: confidential info access, parish limitation, 2-year max
nonCompete.alternativeLanguage: non-compete restrictions per Louisiana RS § 23:921 (max 2 years, parishes worked)

minimumWage.message: Louisiana has NO state minimum wage - federal $7.25 applies

finalPay.message: Final wages due within 15 days or next regular payday
finalPay.requirement: Pay within 15 days of termination or next payday, whichever is earlier

rightToWork.message: Louisiana is RIGHT TO WORK state

breaks.message: NO required meal or rest breaks (under 18 exception)
breaks.detailedExplanation: No break requirements for adults. Minors under 18 have specific break requirements.
